zh.title: 瑞波币/美元技术分析：短线震荡偏弱整理
zh.content:
从价格结构看，XRP/USD当前运行于前期反弹后的整理区间，短线多空力量相对均衡。价格多次测试1.61附近未能有效突破，显示上方抛压仍然存在，整体趋势偏向高位震荡，方向尚未明确。

技术指标方面，价格仍低于SMA(20)的1.6207，均线对价格形成动态压制，短期趋势略显偏弱。MACD处于负值区间，动能柱偏空，说明下行动能尚未完全释放，RSI缺失使超买超卖判断需谨慎。

支撑与阻力方面，下方关键支撑位位于1.58一线，对应日内低点区域，若跌破或引发进一步回调。上方主要阻力位在1.62附近，只有放量站稳该区域，行情才有望打开新的上行空间。

交易策略上，稳健型交易者可等待价格在支撑位企稳后再考虑低吸，或突破1.62后顺势跟进。短线操作应严格设置止损，避免震荡行情中被频繁扫损，整体以控制风险为主。

en.title: Ripple vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
XRP/USD is trading near 1.6079, showing marginal positive movement over the past 24 hours. Price action remains slightly below the 20-day simple moving average at 1.6207, suggesting short-term bearish pressure despite broader consolidation. The session range between 1.5817 and 1.6159 reflects reduced volatility, indicating the market is undecided. Overall structure points to a neutral-to-weak trend unless price can reclaim key moving average levels with conviction.

Momentum indicators offer limited clarity at this stage. The RSI(14) is unavailable, which restricts overbought or oversold assessment, while the MACD reading of -0.0162 remains in negative territory. This implies bearish momentum is still present, though not aggressively so. Without a confirmed signal line, traders should treat MACD signals cautiously and rely more heavily on price behavior around technical levels and volume confirmation.

Immediate support is located near 1.5800, aligning closely with the recent session low at 1.5817. A break below this area could expose downside toward the psychological 1.5500 region. On the upside, resistance is seen at 1.6200–1.6250, where the 20-day SMA converges with recent rejection levels. A decisive close above this zone would strengthen bullish bias and open the path toward 1.6500.

From a trading perspective, range-based strategies may be more suitable until a breakout occurs. Conservative traders might look for long entries near support with tight risk management, while aggressive participants could sell near resistance until trend confirmation emerges. A sustained move above the 20-day SMA would favor short-term longs, whereas a breakdown below 1.5800 would shift focus toward defensive or short positions.
